data.title: Wheelers for Schools
data.meta_description: Wheelers provides an entire world of books in a few clicks. We are the largest supplier of books to Public Libraries and Schools in Australasia. We have the most extensive book database of any library supplier in the world, with unique online tools that compare the availability of print books worldwide to bring you the lowest prices with confirmed availability.
data.text:
Where Late The Sweet Birds Sang (Paperback, New edition)

By: Wilhelm, Kate

Designed by: Chong, Vincen

0

0

The Sumner family can read the signs: the droughts and floods, the blighted crops, the shortages, the rampant diseases and plagues and, above all, the increasing sterility all point to one thing.Their isolated farm in the Appalachian Mountains gives them the ideal place to survive the coming breakdown and their wealth and know - how gives them the means. Men and women must clone themselves for humanity to survive. But what then?

The Sumner family can read the signs: the droughts and floods, the blighted crops, the shortages, the rampant diseases and plagues and, above all, the increasing sterility all point to one thing.Their isolated farm in the Appalachian Mountains gives them the ideal place to survive the coming breakdown and their wealth and know - how gives them the means. Men and women must clone themselves for humanity to survive. But what then?

Read more

Publisher: Orion Publishing

Published: 11 Jan 2007
